Uses of Interface
com.erdi.ezrecipes.api.event.RecipeEvent

  • Packages that use RecipeEvent 
    Package Description
    com.erdi.ezrecipes.api
    The package which contains all the usable tools that EZRecipes' Recipe API provides
    com.erdi.ezrecipes.api.event
    Contains the event types you can listen to using RecipeApi#registerListener(Class, Consumer)
